targets.rawSql:
SELECT sum(gain) as BENEFIT FROM positions WHERE
   $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND symbol IN($var_symbol) AND profit != -1000

SELECT
  (avg(profit) * count(profit))/ 3 as "Profit"
FROM positions WHERE
   $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND symbol IN($var_symbol) AND profit != -1000

SELECT
  avg(profit) as "Avg Profit"
FROM positions WHERE
   $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND symbol IN($var_symbol) AND profit != -1000

SELECT
  strategy,
  avg(profit) AS "Avg Profit"
FROM positions
WHERE
   $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND symbol IN($var_symbol) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY strategy
ORDER by avg(profit) desc

SELECT
  strategy,
  avg(profit) * count(profit) AS "Profit"
FROM positions
WHERE
   $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND symbol IN($var_symbol) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY strategy
ORDER by avg(profit) * count(profit) desc

SELECT
    positions.symbol as "Symbol",
    positions.entry_time * 1000  AS "Entry Time",
    positions.strategy as "Strategy",
    (candles.close_price * 100 / orders.price) - 100.14 as "Current Profit (Live)"
FROM positions INNER JOIN candles ON positions.symbol = candles.symbol JOIN orders ON positions.id = orders.position_id
WHERE
   $__timeFilter(positions.updated_at) AND positions.strategy IN($Strategies) AND positions.symbol IN($var_symbol) 
   AND profit = -1000 AND orders.side = "BUY" AND candles.id = (SELECT c2.id FROM candles AS c2 WHERE c2.symbol = positions.symbol ORDER BY c2.period DESC LIMIT 1)
ORDER BY candles.period DESC

SELECT
  symbol as "Symbol",
  exit_time*1000 as "Exit Time",
  strategy as "Strategy",
  exit_trigger AS "Trigger",
  profit AS "Profit"
FROM positions
WHERE
   $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND symbol IN($var_symbol) AND profit != -1000
ORDER BY exit_time DESC

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "StochRSICustomStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "StochRSICustomStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies)  AND profit != -1000
  AND symbol IN($var_symbol)
GROUP BY WEEK(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "Lun1MarCustomStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "Lun1MarCustomStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY WEEK(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "Lun5JulCustomStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "Lun5JulCustomStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY WEEK(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "MACDCustomStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "MACDCustomStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY WEEK(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "StableStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "StableStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY WEEK(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "MACDInStochRSIOutCustomStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "MACDInStochRSIOutCustomStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY WEEK(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "StochRSIInMACDOutCustomStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "StochRSIInMACDOutCustomStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY WEEK(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "MixedStrategy1"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "MixedStrategy1" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY WEEK(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "StochRSICustomStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "StochRSICustomStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND symbol IN($var_symbol) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY DATE(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "Lun1MarCustomStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "Lun1MarCustomStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY DATE(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "Lun5JulCustomStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "Lun5JulCustomStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY DATE(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "MACDCustomStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "MACDCustomStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY DATE(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "StableStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "StableStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY DATE(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "MACDInStochRSIOutCustomStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "MACDInStochRSIOutCustomStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY DATE(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "StochRSIInMACDOutCustomStrategy"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "StochRSIInMACDOutCustomStrategy" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY DATE(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "MixedStrategy1"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy = "MixedStrategy1" AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY DATE(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "Selected strategies Profit"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy IN($Strategies)  AND profit != -1000
  AND symbol IN($var_symbol)
GROUP BY WEEK(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT DATE(updated_at) as "time", sum(profit) AS "Selected strategies Profit"
FROM positions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND symbol IN($var_symbol) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY DATE(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT
  symbol,
  count(profit) as "Count",
  avg(profit) * count(profit) AS "Total Profit"
FROM positions
WHERE
   $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND symbol IN($var_symbol) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY symbol
HAVING avg(profit) >= 0
ORDER BY avg(profit) * count(profit) DESC

SELECT
  symbol,
  count(profit) as "Count",
  avg(profit) * count(profit) AS "Total Profit"
FROM positions
WHERE
   $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND strategy IN($Strategies) AND symbol IN($var_symbol) AND profit != -1000
GROUP BY symbol
HAVING avg(profit) < 0
ORDER BY avg(profit) * count(profit) DESC

list.definition: SELECT symbol FROM positions GROUP BY symbol
list.label: Symbol
list.name: var_symbol
list.query: SELECT symbol FROM positions GROUP BY symbol
